525390.name: SMILE GAME BUILDER 8-bit Sound Pack
525390.description:
This is a sound resource pack features 8-bit sounds. It is one of must-have resource packs; it has a strong resemblance of famous 8-bit game machines and good old arcade game sounds for creating retro style RPG games. Please make this resource pack useful for your creation.
It contains some loop music for scenes such as maps, towns and battles and also the most suitable jingles for scenes of Game Over and/or Mission Clear.




-+-+-+-+-+- Summary -+-+-+-+-+-
1. Total 34 music files which remind music of famous game consoles and good old sounds of arcade games are included.
2. Data Format: Ogg Vorbis Format (Stereo 44.1khz)
3. This resource pack is royalty-free and available for commercial or non-commercial use only within games rendered using our products, or both using SMILE GAME BUILDER and Exporter for Unity to build to other consoles. Please read End-User Software License Agreement (EULA) for more information.
